name: Spiritual Gifts Test
author: Ministry Vitals

sections.description:
Spiritual Gifts and S.H.A.P.E. Test to help church attendees find their place of service in the local church and other service organizations.

For dynamic control over your Spiritual Gifts or SHAPE sections, along with volunteer position postings and matching qualifications to tests, visit ServeWire VES. Our Volunteer Engagement System includes deep integration with Planning Center, Church Community Builder, and other popular ChMS platforms.

Visit our website for complete instructions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload “spiritualgiftstest.zip” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
  3. Configure the email settings and insert the shortcode on any page.
  4. Visit this page for complete instructions.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Fixed fatal error message for incorrect url name.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
